overview: "Homeless" is a short film that raises awareness about the increasing problem of homelessness in America.  Steve is a homeless man down-on-his-luck, who while looking for a job, comes across a friendly shop owner and an aspiring nurse who try to help.  Inspired by real-life events, this short film highlights the struggles of homeless people and the urgent need for effective support and intervention programs.  Filmed in the backdrop of New York City.
title: Homeless
